com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.ai

Class AbstractAi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.ai.AbstractAi
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DiceWarsAi
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleAi

    public abstract class AbstractAi
extends java.lang.Object
implements DiceWarsAi
    This superclass of DiceWars AI takes a Game to analyze and request selections from.

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract boolean desiredSelection()
      After desiredSelection is called, the next call to makeSelection is guaranteed to be non-null.
      abstract Selectable makeSelection()
      This method will request a selection by the Game of the returned Selectable.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractAi

        public AbstractAi(Game game)
        Parameters:
        game - The Game this AI will analyze and make decisions on. The AI has access to make selections on Territories in the Game.

    • Method Detail

      • makeSelection

        public abstract Selectable makeSelection()
        Description copied from interface: DiceWarsAi
        This method will request a selection by the Game of the returned Selectable. This method will return null if the AI does not deem any Selectable worthy. To ensure a non-null return value, only call this method once after each time desiredSelection returns true.
        Specified by:
        makeSelection in interface DiceWarsAi
        Returns:
        The Selectable that the AI deemed worthy of being selected.

      • desiredSelection

        public abstract boolean desiredSelection()
        Description copied from interface: DiceWarsAi
        After desiredSelection is called, the next call to makeSelection is guaranteed to be non-null.
        Specified by:
        desiredSelection in interface DiceWarsAi
        Returns:
        True if this AI deems a Selectable in the Game to be worthy of Selection, false otherwise.
